Specs: * 16x Blade-Downlinks 1000MBit * 4x External RJ45 10/100/1000MBit * 2 open slots f√ºr TwinGig Transceiver * StackWise Plus stacking
Documentation: * [http://h20000.www2.hp.com/bizsupport/TechSupport/Document.jsp?lang=en&cc=us&objectID=c01515993&jumpid=reg_R1002_USEN HP Product Specifications] * [http://h18000.www1.hp.com/products/quickspecs/13023_div/13023_div.HTML HP QuickSpecs] * [http://www.cisco.com/en/US/products/ps6748/products_installation_and_configuration_guides_list.html Cisco 3120G Configuration Guides] * [http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/switches/blades/3120/hardware/quick/guide/3120gsg.html Cisco 3120G Getting Started Guide] * [http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/switches/blades/3120/hardware/installation/guide/higinstl.html Cisco Catalyst Blade Switch 3120 for HP Hardware Installation Guide] * [http://www.cisco.com/en/US/docs/switches/blades/3120/hardware/installation/guide/3120hig.pdf Cisco Catalyst Blade Switch 3120 for HP Hardware Installation Guide (full book in PDF format)] Capabilities: * Modular Licensing. * Layer 3 Routing (Licensable Option)
